CS:GO is like another planet that I really just don't understand. It's free, you can get into it easily, but let me tell you: it is a weird roller-coaster. As a game, it's solid and well-built. As a nexus of online users and competitive play, it is unbridled, primal chaos.

I recommend it purely to check it out for yourself. Since it's free, you should gather your own opinion from your own experiences, because believe me: I can NOT do it for you, nor can anyone else. Why do you think half of the reviews are memes?
Easily one of the best competitive FPS in the last two decades
